DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : New image procedure , single photon emission compute tomography , may help learn acupuncture affect serotonin level brain breast cancer survivor . PURPOSE : This phase I trial study best way visualize effect acupuncture brain serotonin breast cancer survivor .
DOC.brief_title: Visualization Effect Acupuncture Brain Serotonin Breast Cancer Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: Detailed Description OBJECTIVES : I . To determine feasibility use [ 123-I ] ADAM Serotonin transporter ( SERT ) bind putative biomarker visualize mechanism effect acupuncture hot flash involve serotonin . OUTLINE : Patients undergo acupuncture twice weekly 2 week weekly 6 week . Patients undergo single photon emission compute tomography image iodine 123-I ADAM completion acupuncture . After completion study treatment , patient follow 4 week .
DOC.criteria: History Stage I , II , III breast cancer least 12 month Have see oncologist within previous 6month period determine free disease clinical examination history Have receive endocrine therapy ( tamoxifen aromatase inhibitor least four week ) Experienced hot flash hot flash composite score 5 great per day Hot flash present least month study entry Currently chemotherapy radiation therapy adjuvant treatment Started hormonal therapy tamoxifen aromatase inhibitor within last 4 week ; plan change terminate hormonal therapy next 14 week Any history use psychotropic medication SSRI use past 6 month Any past use centrally act medication clonidine past 6 month Any past diagnosis Major Depressive Episode within last 6 month Any allergy iodine shellfish radionuclear material Current use estrogen and/or progestin Pregnancy Breast feed Women childbearing potential NOT willing use medically acceptable form contraception Current use anticonvulsant gabapentin History cerebral infarction ( include lacunar infarct symptom > = 24 hour duration ) History Binswanger 's disease ( history hypertensive encephalopathy ) History intracranial hemorrhage History head trauma loss consciousness History encephalitis History extend exposure know neurotoxin ( e.g. , cyanide , carbon monoxide ) Uncontrolled metabolic disorder ( e.g. , thyroid disease , diabetes mellitus ) History normal pressure hydrocephalus History Parkinson 's basal ganglia disease History substance abuse previous 6 month
